msbt.message: Hoo! I beg your pardon! I'm a bit of a night owl, don't you know. Drowsy in the daytime. Ah! But more importantly
Oh dear. Pardon me
Good morning, !
Why hello, !
Good evening, !
Happy New Year, !
Welcome to the Museum.
Hoo! I welcome you to the Museum.
How may I be of service?
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
Never mind.
How may I be of service?
Make a donation.
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
Never mind.

Assess fossils.

Make a donation.
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
Never mind.

Ah, ! I have news!Thanks to the philanthropy of our contributors, we have filled ALL of our permanent exhibits. As the spirit of giving has made our halls complete, I will no longer be asking for donations. That said, I do not mind assessing a fossil or two now and again, so please feel free to bring them by. Now, might there be something I can assist you with?
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
Never mind.
Jolly good. Please enjoy the rest of your visit.
Do have a look around. No rush. Take your time.
Ah, but firsthow may I assist you?
Make a donation.
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
Never mind.
Ah, but firsthow may I assist you?
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
Never mind.

Hoo hoo! It's true! Our fossil hall is officially open, . Progress is upon us!Indeed, I've put much thought into streamlining the museum experience for our donors. Thus I've decided that we will accept multiple donations all at once rather than single items one by one! Furthermore, if you wish to learn more about a fossil or fish or bug, I suppose Simply say, "Tell me about this!" Hoot! Hesitate not! I am passionate about imparting knowledge.

Ah, , I have news! A fossil has been found at last here on ! Hoot hoot hooray! I can begin taking fossil donations and conducting examinations. I must say, in this endeavor I do beg your cooperation.Furthermore, I've put much thought into streamlining the museum experience for our donors. Thus I have decided that we shall accept multiple donations all at once rather than single items one by one! Meanwhile, if you wish to learn more about a fossil or fish or bug, I suppose Simply say, "Tell me about this!" Hoot! Hesitate not! I am passionate about imparting knowledge.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
I'm fine.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Make a donation.
Assess fossils.
Tell me about this!
I'm fine.

I'm fine.

I'm fine.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Make a donation.
I'm fine.

Oh dear My apologies!<10_4 /> has a visitor at this very moment I am aflutter with excitement, and therefore cannot accept any donations at this time. Terribly sorry for the inconvenience, hoo! But please do come again soon.
Marvelous! What would you like to donate?
Changed your mind, have you?<10_4 /> Another time then. Your assistance is always welcome.
Woo hoo! Several things, I see! Let us take a look, shall we?<10_8 arg="30" />
Splendid! We will gladly take these off your hands!
Ah, no need to pull them all out! I'll handle the rest from here.
Now, I see you're donating multiples of the same item, though we need only one. You may keep the extra.
Bravo and thank you! Once the museum is complete, it shall be displayed with the utmost dignity.
Rest assured, all donations are displayed in a timely manner.<10_4 /> You have my gratitude!
Eeek! !The horror! The repugnance! Good heavens! I must maintain my composure!
Eeek! ! What a wretched thing
Ahem! I beg your pardon. BugsI do detest them.Still, there's much I can tell you about the insect you apprehended If you insist, that is.
Please tell me!
No, thanks.
Alas, I am obliged to ask Would you like to learn more about this specimen?
Please tell me!
No, thanks.
Ah, I see. In that caseahem
Yes, yes. Understood.
Anyhoot My sincerest thanks for your donation.And though bugs are the bane of my existence, rest assured the wretched thing will get the best of care here.
Hoo hoo! Why, this is !
Hootie hoo! This must be !
Hoo! Woo hoo! This is undoubtedly !
Ooo hoo hoo! Could it be? It is<10_4 /> !
Does this mean<10_4 /> Yes! It is done! The is complete! And a splendid specimen indeed. The was a remarkable creature.Pray tell, might I enlighten you with a few facts?
Let's hear it!
No, thanks.
Wonderful! 'Tis fascinating stuff, I assure you! Now, where to begin
I see. What a shame Anyhoot, I shall gladly accept your generous donation.
I see. Very well, I shall gladly accept your generous donation.Now, I only hope we can find the remaining parts and display the completed fossil. Best of luck!

And that is what I have to say about that. Anyhoot, I will gladly accept your generous donation. I only hope we can find what remains of this fossil and display it in its fully assembled form. Many thanks to you, and best of luck.
I never thought I'd lay eyes upon such a well-preserved . Dear me, might I give you a short presentation on the topic? I am quite knowledgeable, you know.
Please!
I'm a bit busy...
Now, might I interest you in a few fascinating facts about your ?
Yes, please tell me.
I'm a bit busy...
Wonderful! I would love nothing more!
And there you have it. Fascinating stuff, no?
Ah, I see.<10_4 /> Another time, perhapsWell then, let me assure you we shall take very good care of your donation.
Hoo hoo! Thank you very much! My feathers!Why, it seems you have nothing on your person we can accept at this time
We are currently accepting bugs, fish, and properly assessed fossils
We accept donations of bugs, fish, sea creatures, and officially assessed fossils
That is, fossils must first be appraised by yours truly.So if you have a relic of unknown origin, please allow me to give it a look.
If you acquire any of these items, please do consider donating them.
Alas, you have no unknown fossils for me to inspect.Not to worry, you can bring me a fossil anyOLDtime. Hoo hoo! A bit of fossil humor there.
Hoo! What would you like me to assess? I'm all aflutter!
Eh wot? A change of mind, perhaps?<10_4 /> 'Tis your decision entirely
Let me see here. Hmmmindeed
Hoo hoo!
This is most assuredly !
After some consideration, I can safely declare this fossil to be !
Of course! It can be but one thing !
quite remarkable indeed.If only I could take it off your hands. Alas, we already have one, so I must return it to your care.

Your is magnificent indeed. But I fear I must ask your forgiveness I am busy welcoming guests from other islands and cannot ask you to donate it at this time. But please, do come back another time when I can give this matter the attention it deserves!
A splendid specimen in superb conditionIndeed, we would be one step closer to opening our museum with like this. Would you donate this relic of the past to further our museum's future?
I'm donating it!
I'll take it home.

Jolly good! A fabulous find indeed and a fossil we do not yet have in our possession! And as fate would have it, we need but ONE more item to justify our grand museum expansion! This could be the key to improving our noble institution, you know. What do you say? Will you donate this fossil for the betterment of our museum?
I'm donating it!
I'll take it home.

Superb, indeed, splendid! A rare fossil we do not yet have in our collection! This is just the kind of discovery we want to showcase in the museum. What say you? Will you donate it to our noble institution of learning?
I'm donating it!
I'll take it home.
Hoo! More than one, I see! Let us take a closer look, shall we?
Hoo! WOO hoo! These are rare fossils, each and every one, and have not appeared in our collection! I say, you have quite the knack for finding valuable fossils.
Hoo hooray! I've found something that is not yet part of our esteemed collection! It is magnificent indeed! You have a talent for finding the finest of fossils.

Now, I do hope you will consider donating what you've found.The cultural development of is a worthy endeavor indeed. In the meantime, I shall return these to you. But think on what I've said. The museum awaits!

Yes indeed, quite splendid. Alas, our museum already has fossils such as these. I am indeed tempted to purchase these for my personal collectionBut no. I must exercise restraint and return them to you now.
Ah, I see. Well then, here you go.
Hoot! How wonderful! I'll add this to our collection with the utmost haste.
You have my thanks. Now, if only we had the other pieceswe could assemble the entire creature.
Hoo! Woo hoo, if I may be so bold! This means the is complete at last! My feathers, what a creature! So imposing! So striking!Might I tell you a bit about the while I am so inspired?
Yes, please!
I'm a bit busy...
Splendid! Wonderful! 'Tis just what I live for! Now, where was I
Ah! I see As you wish.
It is lovely and indeed a rare fossil we do not yet have on display.Once the museum proper opens, I do hope you consider donating it to our noble institution.
Once the museum expands, I do hope you'll consider donating.
I'm terribly jealous. I only hope I can convince you to donate these and help expand our little museum. In the meantime, I shall return them to you. But do think on what I said! Hoo hoo!
Eh wot? Did you find something rare?Let me take a look and perhaps I can tell you a bit about it.
Hoo! I must say, I'm intrigued to see what you'll bring me next!
Are you sure?<10_4 /> If there's anything you want to know, you have but to ask.
Hoo! Dare I say, EWW! That is !Do be careful! And do NOT release it from its cage! I shudder at the very thought.
Hoo, indeed, hoot! What a splendid !
Hear, hear! We must assess this fossil to determine its origin. Shall I appraise it now?
Yes, please!
Maybe later.
As you wish. But do let me give it a look anytime. I am an appraisal professional, you know.
Splendid! Let me take a look
By my beak! What you have here is !
And that is all I have to say about that. Now, if you please, put away your .

By the by, it would seem our collection is indeed lacking . Personally, I do not mind at all. But professionallyI admit, a contribution of this kind would benefit the museum greatly. Would you, perchance, donate it?
My feathers! I can't help but get carried away when fossils are up for discussion.

Now, I do wish we could purchase your fabulous findAlas, I must be judicious with our limited funds as we have a new museum in the making. No, I shall have to content myself with gazing upon this fossil but for a moment. Indeed, I thank you.

Tut tut, if I but had the Bells, I would purchase this fossil for myself.Alas, I do not, and thus I shall have to content myself with gazing upon it in this moment. Hoo! I do thank you for sharing it with me.
By the by, our collection is in need of .Might I convince you to part with it? For the preservation of our natural history, you see.
By the by, our humble collection is sorely lacking .When our museum is complete, I do hope you'll consider donating it to our noble cause.
Anyhoot, you have my deepest gratitude for allowing me to look upon your magnificent find.
I am quite eager to display the we have for the enjoyment of our patrons.
We have this item on display in the museum at this very moment. Do feel free to take a look at your leisure.
We are sorely lacking , it pains me to say. I confess, I hold out hope you'll consider donating yours.

Hoot! Hooray! Huzzah! I say it again, HUZZAH!My goal Our goal We have finally done it!We've searched far and wide, high and low, and our collections are, at last, complete! I daresay there isn't a finer assembly of scientific, cultural, and artistic specimens in the world! And it is all thanks to the generosity of upstanding donors such as yourself. YOU grew our humble institute into the magnificent marvel it is today with your very own labor. You have my deepest, most profound gratitude. THANK YOU for your commitment to excellence. My feathers! I find I'm nearly speechless at the wonder of it all.

Wot wot? I say, what's this? I know a thing or two about fell swoops. But this Yes! Indeed, YES! A number of our collections have been completed simultaneously thanks to you! Your time and effort, andwell, frankly, your donationshave made this museum a WONDER! Completed collections make my heart flutter. And I assure you, we shall treat these treasures with respect. Hoot! I thank you for your hard work and continued generosity.

Hoo! Ewww! And, eh, hats off to you. I daresay I am the very picture of an emotional roller coaster! To wit, whilst I am pleased to announce we have completed our insect collection I am DISpleased to be in the presence of so many bugs. Ugh!Tut tut, never you mind. It is my feelings of humble gratitude that win the day. Our bug collection is complete thanks to you, and our museum is a better place too. I shudder as I say this, but you have my sincerest thanks for bringing us so many insects, .

Hoo WHAT?! You found the missing piece to the museum's fish puzzle, ! Erthat is to say We had a fish- shaped hole in our fish collection and nowwe do not. My feathers! I get so flustered when a museum collection is completed.What I meant to say isyour fishing proficiency and generosity is greatly appreciated. Hoot hoot hooray! Our museum is a better place because of YOU today!

Hoo hoo! Is it true? The final fossil has been found? <10_4 />It has! It has! Indeed, HUZZAH! Ah, Before you took up the task, ours was but abare-bones collectionHoo hoo hoo ha ha! A bit of museum humor for you there.Ahem. Yes. That is to sayTHANK YOU for your commitment to collecting and donating fossils.Our humble museum's reputation is growing because of you.
Our noble institution displays relics, rare items, and masterpieces from a variety of disciplines. I heartily encourage you to peruse these wonders at your leisure.
Our collection is not yet complete, but our displays do feature some rare items and masterpieces. Do enjoy all this institution has to offer at your leisure.
